channel.title: Tools on Thai Ho
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Thai Ho

item.title: Essential Softwares
item.description: This features a non-exhaustive list of my Essential Softwares for PC. Windows 10 Chocolatey: command-line-based package manager # Open cmd or powershell in Administrative mode Get-ExecutionPolicy # If it returns Restricted, then run Set-ExecutionPolicy AllSigned # or Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process # Install choco Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force; [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol -bor 3072; iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://chocolatey.org/install.ps1')) # check choco 7zip choco install -y 7zip LockHunter: find and kill processes occupying certain files.
